name: RTX Red Rock
synopsis: The year is 2103 and Mars needs your help. As E.Z. Wheeler, a biomechanically enhanced soldier, you'll fight a one-man war against aliens who have captured your Mars colony. Plunge into battle on the Red Planet armed with deadly alien weapons, your own superpowers, and a digital sidekick named Iris. Fight your way across the frozen deserts, through Earth's ruined colony, and into the exotic interiors of alien ships in ten single-player and four- multiplayer levels. On the farthest frontiers of space,it's your mission to exterminate the brutal aliens before they attack Earth.
